translation.en: Okay. All right, one, two, three...
translation.zh: 好 一 二 三

translation.en: Guys! One...
Hold on. Guys, freeze!
ALVIN: Hey, Dave. Where's Alvin?
Where have you been? Where have I been?
Trying to board the ship.
Already done that. Also, checked out our room,
translation.zh: 我已经上船了 我还看了我们的房间

translation.en: dibbed the side of the bed closest to the window,
ordered us a round of virgin pina coladas
translation.zh: 我点了一轮无酒精的椰林风情

translation.en: and signed us up for parasailing.
Alvin, you're too young for parasailing.
translation.zh: 艾文 你太小了 不能玩滑翔伞

translation.en: I thought we were going on vacation to have fun.
translation.zh: 我以为我们要度假玩乐

translation.en: Don't worry, family vacations are all about fun.
translation.zh: 放心 全家出游就是要玩乐

translation.en: But first we're gonna need to set some rules.
translation.zh: 但我们得先把规矩订出来

translation.en: Let's start with you can't call dibs on a bed until everyone's in the room.
translation.zh: 首先 你别选床 等大家都到再说

translation.en: That's right. ELEANOR: Good rule.
That's a good one, Simon. All right, so that's our first rule.
translation.zh: 赛门 这样很棒 好 这是第一个规矩

translation.en: Should we go over the rest of them?
Dave, come on. "Rules" is my middle name.
translation.zh: 大卫 拜托 规矩我最行了

translation.en: Alvin! Hey, Dave.
This is your captain speaking.
All kids are now allowed to play
on the adults-only Serenity Deck.
translation.zh: 仅限大人的安全区玩耍了

translation.en: (GRUNTING)
Alvin!
Alvin!
We talked about setting rules, Alvin.
I'm sorry.
I didn't know the agreement meant no fun.
translation.zh: 我不晓得 订好规矩就不好玩了

translation.en: You're allowed to have fun.
When are you going to stop acting like a child?
When are you going to stop treating me like a child?
translation.zh: 你什么时候才不会把我当小孩看？

translation.en: I'll stop treating you like a child when you start acting like a grown-up!
translation.zh: 等你像大人 我就不把你当小孩看

translation.en: I'll start acting like a grown-up when you start...
translation.zh: 我会开始像大人 等你…

translation.en: CHIPETTES: Aw. Hey, girls, not now, please, okay?
translation.zh: 鼠美眉 现在先不要 好吗？

translation.en: SIMON: Sorry, Dave. ALVIN: Lame!
I need to get ready for dinner with the captain.
translation.zh: 我要准备跟船长吃晚饭了

translation.en: (GASPS) We're having dinner with the captain?
No, I am. You're staying here.
translation.zh: 是我要跟他吃饭 你们留在这

translation.en: I have to go apologize for everything Alvin did.
This is so not fair. Not to us, not to Dave,
translation.zh: 不公平 这对我们不公平 对大卫不公平 对船长更不公平

translation.en: and certainly not to the captain,
translation.zh: 对大卫不公平 对船长更不公平

translation.en: who I'm sure was really looking forward to dining with me.
translation.zh: 我相信船长很想跟我吃晚饭

translation.en: Why don't I go speak with Dave?
See if I can smooth things over.
translation.zh: 看我能不能把事情办好

translation.en: SIMON: Knock-knock.
What is it, Simon?
Well, I would never say this to Alvin.
translation.zh: 我绝对不会跟艾文这么说

translation.en: Goodness knows he can be totally irresponsible,
translation.zh: 天知道他有多不负责任

translation.en: but I actually have a suggestion.
You have a suggestion for me?
He's been driving me crazy a lot longer
than he's been driving you crazy.
translation.zh: 时间比把你逼疯还要久

translation.en: All right. So what is it?
Imagine Alvin is a spirited racehorse.
translation.zh: 把艾文当成精神抖擞的赛马

translation.en: That's your advice?
No. I'm not done yet, Dave.
translation.zh: 不 大卫 我还没说完

translation.en: All right, so Alvin is a racehorse...
translation.zh: 好 所以艾文是赛马

translation.en: And you, Dave, are his incredibly helpful jockey
translation.zh: 而大卫你 是他的超级骑师

translation.en: who's there to guide him down the racetrack of life.
translation.zh: 你要教他赛马的大道理

translation.en: But if you hold the reins too tight,
translation.zh: 但如果你把缰拉得太紧

translation.en: that racehorse is going to fight and buck,
which is no fun for anyone.
But if you loosen the reins just a little...
He'll fly right off the track and crash into the fence.
translation.zh: 他会跑出跑道 撞到护栏

translation.en: I know you want to protect Alvin,
but, Dave, sometimes kids will rise to the occasion
translation.zh: 可是大卫 有时小朋友会成功

translation.en: if you just show them a little trust.
translation.zh: 只要你给他们一点信任

translation.en: All right, guys, room service is on its way. Lights out by 9:00.
translation.zh: 客房服务快送到了 大家九点以前要睡觉

translation.en: Dave, question.
translation.zh: 大卫 我有一个问题

translation.en: If we're going to be held captive in this room...
translation.zh: 如果要把我们关在房间里…

translation.en: Because of Alvin!
Can we at least watch a movie?
translation.zh: 起码能让我们看电影吧？

translation.en: All right, let's see what's on.
translation.zh: 好 来看电视在演什么吧

translation.en: You know what, why don't you guys pick a movie?
translation.zh: 这样吧 你们挑一部电影吧

translation.en: You're old enough to make your own decision.
translation.zh: 你们不小了 可以自己做决定

translation.en: For real, Dave?
Absolutely.
Ooh! Dave looks so elegant.
translation.zh: 哇 大卫看起来好有气质喔

translation.en: Have fun!
Wait, Dave, before you go, I made something for you.
translation.zh: 等等 大卫 先别走 我做了东西给你

translation.en: Wow, it's really...
It's soft so you can sleep in it
translation.zh: 这很软 你戴着睡都行

translation.en: and I made it with all the colors, so it will go with everything!
translation.zh: 我用了全部的颜色 所以什么都能搭配

translation.en: Great. I'll put it on after dinner.
translation.zh: 太棒了 我吃完晚饭会戴上

translation.en: You could put it on now, so everyone at the captain's table could see it.
translation.zh: 你现在就能戴了 这样坐船长那桌的人都能看到

translation.en: A real chick magnet.
translation.zh: 太棒了 把妹的利器

translation.en: All right, guys, have fun.
translation.zh: 好了 你们开心玩吧

translation.en: But not too much fun, because I'm still very upset.
translation.zh: 但别玩过头了 因为我的心情还很差

translation.en: Goodbye, Dave.
And, hello, ladies!
(MIMICKING SEAN CONNERY) I like my tail shaken, not stirred.
translation.zh: 我喜欢抖抖尾巴 而不是随便乱摆

translation.en: Where are you going?
To the casino. I'm feeling lucky.
translation.zh: 去赌场啊 我感觉手气会很好

translation.en: Oh, no. No, no, no, no. Dave said...
translation.zh: 不 不行 大卫说…

translation.en: Dave said, and I quote, (CLEARS THROAT)
"We're old enough to make our own decisions."
translation.zh: 我们不小了 可以自己做决定

translation.en: He meant we were old enough to choose a film!
translation.zh: 他的意思是我们可以自己选电影看

translation.en: Well, we're clearly not. Check out what Theodore just picked.
translation.zh: 显然不是 你看喜多刚挑了什么

translation.en: (CHEERFUL MUSIC PLAYING)
What's wrong with this movie?
It's for babies!
Which is probably why Dave treats us like babies.
translation.zh: 这可能是大卫把我们 当小孩看的原因

translation.en: Munk up, Theodore.
There. That's more like it.
Alvin, please!
I say we go to Salsa Night!
In our pajamas?
Oh, I know!
Alvin!
Alvin! Alvin!
And we have a winner.
Ellie, I love these dresses!
translation.zh: 伊妮 这些衣服很漂亮

translation.en: You're so crafty.
Thanks. It's what I do.
Ow! Oh! Sorry!
Ew! What are you?
(LAUGHS) We are the Chipettes.
Hi, I'm Eleanor!
My sister was just trying to apologize.
What's she sorry for? Stepping on my friend's foot?
translation.zh: 她为什么要道歉？ 因为踩到我朋友的脚吗？

translation.en: Or her busted, tired little dance moves?
Oh, no, you didn't!
Oh, yes, she did!
You better get those Lee Press-Ons out of my face
translation.zh: 你最好把甲片从我的眼前拿开

translation.en: unless you want to meet my claws.
translation.zh: 否则就等着看我的爪子了

translation.en: And, yeah, baby, they're real.
translation.zh: 没错 宝贝 这是真的

translation.en: Hit it! Do you wanna go?
DAVE: Captain, I'm really sorry about what happened.
translation.zh: 船长 发生这种事我真的很抱歉

translation.en: Alvin, he's a kid. He's just trying to have some fun.
translation.zh: 艾文 他是小孩 他只是想玩

translation.en: There's nothing wrong with fun.
Our pelican makes sure that everybody on the ship has fun.
translation.zh: 鹈鹕人员要确保船上人人都开心

translation.en: In fact, in port, he circles the ship on a hang glider.
translation.zh: 事实上 在港口 他用滑翔翼绕着船飞

translation.en: It's really quite amusing.
However, my number one priority is the passengers' safety.
translation.zh: 不过 乘客的安全是我的第一重任

translation.en: So I simply cannot have Alvin put himself, or anyone else, at risk again.
translation.zh: 我不能再让艾文或别人有危险了

translation.en: Believe me, I understand.
If Alvin breaks any more of our rules, there will be consequences.
translation.zh: 如果艾文再打破规矩 后果自负

translation.en: The last thing we want is anyone getting hurt. Excuse me.
translation.zh: 我们很不希望有人受伤

translation.en: Hot! WAITER: Sorry. Hot!
Unbelievable. Gravy pants.
translation.zh: 搞什么啊 裤子上都是肉汁

translation.en: Hey, hey!
Do you have a problem with me?
You bet I have a problem with you.
Why? As if you didn't know.
I don't know.
Ian? What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 伊恩 你来这里干嘛？

translation.en: I'm working, Dave.
This is your job?
Yeah, not too many record labels are interested in hiring the guy
translation.zh: 很少有唱片公司会想用一个

translation.en: who blew it with the Chipmunks, blew it with the Chipettes
translation.zh: 跟花栗鼠和鼠美眉的关系 都搞不好的人

translation.en: and passed on Justin Bieber.
translation.zh: 然后还不跟贾斯汀签约

translation.en: Twice.
Look, Ian, I'm sorry you lost your job and your dignity.
translation.zh: 伊恩 抱歉你丢了饭碗跟尊严

translation.en: But spilling things, hot things, on me
translation.zh: 不过把热汤泼到我身上

translation.en: isn't going to bring any of that stuff back.
You're right, Dave. It's too late for me to get my old life back.
translation.zh: 大卫 你说的对 我要回到从前的生活已经太迟了

translation.en: But it's not too late to ruin yours.
translation.zh: 但我还来得及毁掉你的人生

translation.en: You want to ruin my life?
Why don't we just start with this vacation?
translation.zh: 我们何不从这次度假下手？

translation.en: If I see those chipmunks break so much as one rule,
translation.zh: 只要被我发现 那些花栗鼠有丝毫不守规矩

translation.en: I'm going straight to Captain Correlli.
translation.zh: 我就直接跟柯瑞里船长报告

translation.en: You're in my house now!
Although, technically it's not a house, it's a ship.
translation.zh: 不过说起来这不是家 这是船

translation.en: The point is, I'll be watching you.
translation.zh: 重点是 我会注意你的

translation.en: Like a hawk!
Theodore?
Please don't eat my brain!
translation.zh: 拜托你别吃掉我的脑袋

translation.en: Why are you watching Jungle Monster 4?
Alvin, how could you...
Alvin?
Simon?
Girls?
Oh, no. No, no, no, no, no, no, no!
(GASPS) I'll be right back!
It's dark. (DOOR SHUTS)
You're up for an International Music Award. That's fantastic!
translation.zh: 你入围国际音乐奖了 太棒了

translation.en: Yeah, it's pretty cool.
I guess. If you like a lot of adulation.
translation.zh: 我想是吧 如果你很爱谄媚的话

translation.en: We fly there right after the cruise.
translation.zh: 我们坐完船之后要坐飞机过去

translation.en: Hoping to take home Record of the Year.
translation.zh: 希望能拿到年度最佳唱片奖

translation.en: That would make you the youngest winner ever.
translation.zh: 这样你就是最年轻的得主了

translation.en: I'm not that young.
I mean, I'm hanging out in a casino way past my bedtime.
translation.zh: 我在赌场鬼混 我早过了睡觉时间了

translation.en: Not that I have a bedtime! (LAUGHS NERVOUSLY) No one tells me what to do.
translation.zh: 我没有睡觉时间啊 没人会规定我

translation.en: DAVE: Alvin!
Who's Alan, I wonder?
Anyway.
I'd love to chat more, but I've gotta run.
translation.zh: 我很想继续聊 但我得走了

translation.en: You're in a lot of trouble, young man!
ALVIN: You can follow me on Critter!
Alvin! Alvin!
Simon?
I wasn't betting. Honest.
Your winnings, sir.
translation.zh: 先生 这是你赢的钱

translation.en: Oh, busted!
I didn't sneak out. I mean, I did. But only to stop Alvin.
translation.zh: 我没溜出去 我是说我有啦 但我只是为了阻止艾文

translation.en: Right. IAN: There they are, Captain.
Captain.
ALVIN: What's he going to do, make us walk the plank?
(GASPS) There's a plank?
No, there's no plank, but if you guys disobey me one more time,
translation.zh: 没有板子 不过你们再不听我的话

translation.en: you will be off the ship.
And you'll miss the International Music Awards. Do you understand?
translation.zh: 这样你们就会错过国际音乐奖 了解吗？

translation.en: Yes, Dave. Uh-huh.
Absolutely.
What if we need to disobey you?
translation.zh: 如果我们不听你的话呢？

translation.en: And why would you need to do that?
Well, let's say that you tell me to stay put.
"Alvin, if you move from that chair, you're grounded!"
translation.zh: “艾文 如果你从椅子上下来 你就被禁足了”

translation.en: But then I happen to see pirates
climbing up ropes, ever so stealthy, from the side of the ship.
Now, it would be easy for me
translation.zh: 而我可以拿瑞士刀割断绳索

translation.en: to take my trusty old Swiss Army knife and cut the ropes.
But I have to stay put. Or do I?
translation.zh: 可是如果碰到这种情况 我也不能乱跑 是吗？

translation.en: Yes, Alvin, you do. And what are you doing with a pocket knife?
translation.zh: 是的 艾文 你拿小刀干嘛？

translation.en: What pocket knife are you referring to?
Come on, give it to me. You could cut yourself.
translation.zh: 好了 交给我 你可能会割伤自己

translation.en: So, I could have saved the whole ship from robbage and pilgering
translation.zh: 我能拯救全船的人不被海盗乱抢

translation.en: and you'd still ground me?
Alvin, there's no such word as robbage. And it's "pillaging."
translation.zh: 艾文 那不是乱抢 那叫抢劫

translation.en: But he does have a point, Dave.
translation.zh: 大卫 但他说的有道理

translation.en: There's got to be times when you trust us
to take matters into our own hands.
I trusted you tonight and look where that got me!
translation.zh: 我今晚就信任你们 结果呢？

translation.en: That's probably just the hot gravy talking.
translation.zh: 他应该是被热汤浇迷糊了吧

translation.en: You're all lucky Captain Correlli
translation.zh: 柯瑞里船长让你们再参加一个活动

translation.en: has allowed you one more activity.
Is it hang gliding, wakeboarding, or bungee jumping?
translation.zh: 是滑翔翼？水上滑板？ 还是高空弹跳？

translation.en: No. Shuffleboard.
translation.zh: 不是 是打圆盘游戏

translation.en: (ALL GROAN) ALVIN: Man!
By my calculations,
it appears to be 10% shuffle, 90% bored.
(GIGGLES) That's funny!
Oh, Thanks. You really think so?
translation.zh: 谢了 你真的觉得吗？

translation.en: You know, Dave, I think I'd prefer the plank.
translation.zh: 大卫 我想我宁愿跳海

translation.en: Sorry, Alvin, but this is what you get to do.
translation.zh: 抱歉 艾文 你们只能玩这个

translation.en: And I get to do something I haven't done in a long time.
translation.zh: 我要做一件很久都没做的事

translation.en: Absolutely nothing.
ALVIN: Brittany approaches her puck,
adjusts her stance, looks over at me, quite annoyed,
translation.zh: 调整她的姿势 同时不爽地看着我

translation.en: wonders to herself if I'm ever going to shut my mouth,
realizes I'm not, and makes her move.
translation.zh: 发现我不会后 开始出手

translation.en: And... Oh! Oh, it's short! (LAUGHING)
A costly error, ladies and gentlemen,
translation.zh: 重大失误 各位先生女士们

translation.en: that's going to haunt her the rest of her career.
You can make all the jokes you want, Alvin,
translation.zh: 艾文 你可以随便开玩笑

translation.en: but not even you can make this interesting.
translation.zh: 但是你却不能把游戏变好笑

translation.en: Oh, really? Well, care to make it interesting that I can make this interesting?
Alvin, what are you up to? Need I remind you Dave is watching us.
translation.zh: 艾文 你想干嘛？ 要我提醒你大卫在注意我们吗？

translation.en: Simon, the poor guy hasn't had a moment's peace since he met us.
translation.zh: 赛门 那可怜的家伙 自从认识我们以后就不安稳

translation.en: He's exhausted.
Check this out. In three, two, one.
translation.zh: 你看 三 二 一

translation.en: Lights out.
Time to turn punishment into funishment.
translation.zh: 处罚变玩乐的时候到了

translation.en: (LAUGHING) You get it?
I took the "pun" in punishment, and turned it into "fun,"
but kept the "ishment." It's word play!
What? Uh-huh.
ALVIN: Hey, kid!
Wanna make a trade? That's a nice-looking kite.
translation.zh: 你想交换吗？你的风筝很漂亮

translation.en: I can see Russia from here!
translation.zh: 我从这里看得到俄罗斯

translation.en: Come on, Simon, grab on.
translation.zh: 快点 赛门 抓着

translation.en: Forget it. All I ever do is try to save him
translation.zh: 算了 我老是在救他

translation.en: and it only gets me in trouble!
This won't end well.
Simon, do something!
Oh, seriously?
Simon, help!
Alvin's gotten himself in a bind.
Looks like it's Simon saving him again!
(LAUGHS) Thanks, bro.
No!
Thank you! Huh?
MAN: Whoa! Hey!
SIMON: Dave! Dave! Ow!
ALL: Dave!
THEODORE: Help us!
(SCREAMS)
DAVE: Guys! Guys!
No! No! No, no, no! No! No!
CHIPMUNKS: Dave! Help us!
Oh, no, no, no, no, no.
You want to go hang gliding,
sign up at the Excursion Desk like everyone else.
Ian, you don't understand!
Oh, I think I do.
Dave Seville is so special that the rules don't apply to him.
translation.zh: 大卫塞维尔很特别 不用遵守规定

translation.en: Let go! No, you let go.
IAN: I need my pelican head!
DAVE: Help!
Ian! You idiot!
Oh, no. No, no.
Great. Way to go, Seville.
translation.zh: 太好了 塞维尔 真有你的

translation.en: Me? Yeah, you!
Hey!
Save your breath, Dave. They'll come back for me.
translation.zh: 省省吧 他们一定会回来接我的

translation.en: In retrospect, this was a bad idea.
translation.zh: 现在想想呢 这是馊主意

translation.en: We're losing altitude!
I don't think I can make it much longer.
I'm so hungry. Just one bite.
translation.zh: 我好饿 吃一口就好

translation.en: No.
A nibble? No nibbles.
translation.zh: 那一小口呢？ 也不行

translation.en: Maybe I can just lick the glaze?
The glaze is what's keeping you alive, Theodore!
translation.zh: 喜多 糖浆是让你保命的东西

translation.en: Its high fat content is creating a waterproof barrier.
I'm gonna starve to death!
Actually, there are many other things
translation.zh: 其实 在你饿死之前

translation.en: that will kill you before starvation.
translation.zh: 有很多事情会让你死掉

translation.en: Dehydration, sunstroke...
translation.zh: 比如 脱水 中暑

translation.en: (GASPS) An island.
No, an island would probably be helpful.
translation.zh: 不是 岛可能会救命

translation.en: So if you see one, you should definitely say something.
Uh, Jeanette?
Oh!
(LAUGHING) We're alive! We're alive!
Good. Because now
I'm going to kill you!
Guys, guys, guys! Nobody is killing anyone, okay?
translation.zh: 各位 谁都不准杀谁 好吗？

translation.en: No matter how much he deserves it.
Thank you, Si. Though I could have done without the passive aggression.
translation.zh: 赛门 谢了 不过你也别说我活该

translation.en: (CLEARS THROAT) Look, we've got nothing to worry about.
translation.zh: 听着 我们不用担心

translation.en: Dave knows we're gone by now.
translation.zh: 大卫现在知道我们不见了

translation.en: He probably has the whole coast guard looking for us.
translation.zh: 他可能叫海岸警卫队找我们了

translation.en: Meantime, why don't we all just relax and have some donut?
translation.zh: 这时候 我们放松吃甜甜圈吧

translation.en: Did you guys want some?
Theodore! Alvin! Simon!
Can't you kick any faster?
It's been two hours, Dave.
translation.zh: 大卫 我已经踢两小时了

translation.en: Thanks to biannual Pilates classes, I have legs that won't quit,
translation.zh: 还好我一年上两次普拉提 我的腿力很好

translation.en: but they do slow down.
(SIGHS) Take those feet off, let me kick.
translation.zh: 把脚掌拿掉 给我来踢

translation.en: They don't come off. It's one piece.
translation.zh: 这拿不掉 这是一体成型的

translation.en: No quality mascot suit has removable feet.
translation.zh: 好的吉祥物服装是不能把脚拿掉的

translation.en: Take the suit off, then.
I can't.
Why not?
I'm not wearing anything underneath.
Look!
No, no, it's okay, I believe you.
No, look!
Look, an island!
Maybe the chipmunks washed up there.
translation.zh: 说不定花栗鼠漂上岸了

translation.en: Kick!
Faster! Come on.
Okay, there we go.
It won't be long before a rescue plane sees our SOS
translation.zh: 很快会有救援飞机 看到我们的求救信号

translation.en: and flies us back to civilization.
translation.zh: 然后载我们重返文明地带

translation.en: I don't hear any planes. Or helicopters.
translation.zh: 我听不到飞机或直升机的声音

translation.en: THEODORE: Maybe Dave is coming in a hot-air balloon.
translation.zh: 说不定大卫会坐热气球来

translation.en: Because those things are really quiet.
I don't think Dave is gonna be in a hot-air balloon.
translation.zh: 我不觉得大卫会坐热气球来

translation.en: But he is coming, right?
Of course he is.
Just maybe not today.
Alvin's right. We should prepare to stay the night.
translation.zh: 艾文说的对 我们应该准备过夜

translation.en: What? You guys expect me to sleep outside?
translation.zh: 什么？你们要我睡在外面？

translation.en: Last I checked, Brit, we're chipmunks.
translation.zh: 贝妮 我们可是花栗鼠

translation.en: We're used to living in the wild.
No, we used to be used to living in the wild.
translation.zh: 不 我们是从前习惯野外的生活

translation.en: Come on, Brit, it's just one night.
translation.zh: 好了 贝妮 就一晚而已

translation.en: One cold night.
translation.zh: 冷死人的一晚 我们生火就好

translation.en: So we'll make a fire. We're always setting things on fire accidentally.
translation.zh: 我们生火就好 我们老是不小心引起火灾

translation.en: How hard can it be when we put our minds to it?
And how are you intending to do that?
I will create a spark by striking this rock with my Swiss Army knife,
translation.zh: 我要用瑞士刀划石头激起火花

translation.en: which Dave took from me.
translation.zh: 可是瑞士刀被大卫拿走了

translation.en: I suppose you have a better idea, smart guy?
translation.zh: 天才 你有更好的主意吧？

translation.en: As a matter of fact, I do, smart guy.
translation.zh: 事实上 天才 我的确有

translation.en: As you can see, the lens concentrates the energy of the sun,
translation.zh: 镜片能集中太阳的热能

translation.en: thus creating fire!
Whoa. Impressive.
(AWKWARDLY) Thanks. Thank you.
Thanks for thinking that.
Hot, hot, hot! (YELPS)
We have made fire!
So, what do we do now?
translation.zh: 那… 我们现在怎么办？

translation.en: Alvin! Brittany!
We've gotta head inland.
If we climb to the top of that mountain,
we'll be able to get a better view of the island,
see if they're here.
translation.zh: 看看他们是不是在这里

translation.en: All right, got it.
What are you doing?
What? Building a fire.
You know, one time in the studio, Snoop ran out of matches,
translation.zh: 有一次在录音室 史努比狗狗没火柴了

translation.en: got a blaze going with just two carrot sticks.
translation.zh: 我只用两根胡萝卜棒就把火生起来

translation.en: Figure, how hard can it be?
Forget the fire. We have to start hiking.
translation.zh: 别管生火了 我们得爬山

translation.en: Yeah, okay, Dave. Look, it's getting dark-ish.
It's gonna be cold. I'm gonna build a fire. We'll go in the morning.
translation.zh: 天气会变冷 我要生火 我们早上再去

translation.en: (SHOUTING ANGRILY) No, we'll go now.
translation.zh: 不行 我们现在就去

translation.en: Don't take that tone of voice with me, Dave.
translation.zh: 大卫 少对我用这种口气

translation.en: I'm not one of your chipmunks that you can just boss around
translation.zh: 我不是花栗鼠 可以让你随便指使

translation.en: and stuff into a cage whenever you feel like it.
translation.zh: 只要你想 就可以把他们关进笼子

translation.en: That was you, Ian!
Calm down.
Jeez, no wonder those furballs would rather fly off the ship
translation.zh: 天啊 怪不得他们宁愿飞走

translation.en: than spend another day with you.
translation.zh: 也不想再跟你相处下去

translation.en: They didn't do it on purpose.
It was an accident. They're just kids.
translation.zh: 那是意外 他们只是小朋友

translation.en: I don't know how long they can survive out there.
translation.zh: 我不知道他们能在这里熬多久

translation.en: ALVIN: And you guys were worried. (LAUGHING) Look at us!
translation.zh: 你们刚刚还很担心 看看我们！

translation.en: We're warm, we got a great fire going, beautiful night sky
translation.zh: 我们很暖和 还生了火 还有美丽的夜空

translation.en: and if a rescue helicopter comes by, they'll see us!
translation.zh: 如果救援直升机经过 他们就会看到我们

translation.en: Everything's gonna be fine.
Good night, guys.
Good night.
Good night.
(YAWNS) Good night.
Night.
ALL: Theodore!
What? Dave always turns off the light after saying good night.
translation.zh: 干嘛？大卫说完晚安之后都会关灯

translation.en: That fire was sort of the only thing keeping us from freezing to death.
translation.zh: 只有火才不会让我们冻死

translation.en: Yeah!
Can't you just relight it?
How?
With your glasses. And the sun?
Oh.
All right! Way to keep the spirits up, guys.
translation.zh: 好 真是振奋人心啊

translation.en: Doing it, yeah!
And what is this supposed to be?
Breakfast!
No, it's bark.
Yeah, for breakfast!
I bet it's very good.
It's not.
It's been forever since our last all-you-can-eat buffet.
translation.zh: 我们已经很久没有吃到饱了

translation.en: Crazy suggestion, guys,
let's get off this beach and let's find some real food.
translation.zh: 我们离开海滩去找真正的食物吧

translation.en: If I know my horticulture, and I do,
this is a grove of mango trees.
Then where are all the mangoes?
Maybe the Jungle Monster 4 ate them all!
translation.zh: 说不定被丛林四怪物吃光了

translation.en: You were planning on sharing that, right?
(LAUGHS NERVOUSLY) Of course.
Oh, well, good.
'Cause it kind of looked like you were gonna eat it all by yourself.
translation.zh: 因为你看起来像要独吞的样子

translation.en: What? I would never do that.
translation.zh: 什么？我才不会做这种事

translation.en: I don't believe you!
Hey!
Yeah! Winning!
What?
I'll make sure to save you the pit!
Oh, my acorns!
Way to go, Theodore! Come on, we'll split it.
translation.zh: 喜多 太好了 我们分着吃

translation.en: Don't listen to him, Theo.
He's gonna eat it all by himself.
I'll share it with you.
No. She's trying to trick you.
No, you're trying to trick him.
No, you're trying to trick him by saying I'm trying to trick him.
translation.zh: 是你想骗他 才说我想骗他

translation.en: He's lying, Theo!
(GASPS) What?
Theodore, I am so sorry!
Oh, no!
My precious! My precious!
Stop it! Stop it! Stop it! Look at us.
One day on this island and we've become animals!
translation.zh: 我们才在岛上待了一天就成了野兽

translation.en: (GASPS) Did you hear that?
(GASPS) What was that?
Jungle Monster.
Positions, everybody.
Hold.
Hold.
Fire!
No! Why?
Please don't eat us, Mr. Jungle Monster!
translation.zh: 丛林怪物先生 拜托别吃我们

translation.en: I'm not a monster, I'm Zoe. And I'm clearly a girl
translation.zh: 我不是怪物 我是佐伊 而且一看就知道我是女生

translation.en: who has been on this island for so long
translation.zh: 我在这座岛上待了太久

translation.en: that now she's imagining that squirrels can talk.
translation.zh: 已经产生幻觉了 松鼠会说话吗？

translation.en: We are chipmunks.
Yeah, Alvin and the Chipmunks.
Who and the what now?
I'm sure you've heard of the Chipettes. We're kind of world famous.
translation.zh: 你一定听过鼠美眉 全世界的人都知道我们

translation.en: Who?
Maybe this will help.
ALVIN: Lame! Okay. Stop.
I don't know who you are.
translation.zh: -逊 -什么？ 我不知道你们是谁

translation.en: Awkward!
Exactly how long have you been here?
Well, I got here on a Monday, so...
Yeah, like, you know, eight or nine years?
Nine years? Wait. You've been here nine years?
Well, it could be eight.
(GASPS) What if we're here nine years?
translation.zh: 如果我们在这里待九年怎么办？

translation.en: What if we're here forever?
translation.zh: 如果我们在这里永远待下去怎么办？

translation.en: I told you, Dave's coming.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过了 大卫会来

translation.en: I used to think that Dave was coming, too.
translation.zh: 我以前也以为大卫会来

translation.en: And he never did.
Dave Henderson, my supervisor at UPS.
translation.zh: 大卫韩德森 我快递公司的主管

translation.en: I used to fly cargo planes for them,
until one day I crash-landed in the ocean.
We crash-landed, too.
Really?
But our Dave won't rest until he finds us.
translation.zh: 可是大卫绝对会想办法找到我们

translation.en: Right, Alvin?
Absolutely. (CHUCKLES NERVOUSLY)
You mean I'm finally gonna get out of here?
translation.zh: 你是说我终于要离开这里了？

translation.en: I can't wait to go tell the others!
translation.zh: 我好想赶快跟其他人说

translation.en: (GASPS) There are others?
I mean, can you guys imagine being stuck here for all these years
translation.zh: 你们能想象困在这里这么多年

translation.en: without anybody to talk to?
I think I'd lose my mind!
Chipmunks, I'm pleased to introduce my friends.
translation.zh: 花栗鼠 我要介绍我的朋友

translation.en: This is Rawlings, Spalding, Callaway,
translation.zh: 这是罗林斯 史柏丁 卡勒威

translation.en: Dunlop, and, right there, that's Nerf.
Hey, girlfriend, you look good.
They survived the crash with me.
translation.zh: 他们跟我一起熬过坠机

translation.en: Okay.
Hi. Hi.
Okay. Hello.
I'm Theodore.
Guys, Dave is coming to get us!
translation.zh: 各位 大卫会来救我们

translation.en: No, not Dave Henderson. I saw your face!
translation.zh: 但不是大卫韩德森噢 我看到你的表情了

translation.en: It's another Dave.
But, you guys, just get excited.
We're finally gonna get off this island.
translation.zh: 我们终于要离开这座岛了

translation.en: She's funny.
In a crazy sort of way.
This totally calls for a party. Who's hungry?
translation.zh: 我们一定要开派对庆祝 谁肚子饿了？

translation.en: Yeah! Yes, please!
We are famished. I'm hungry.
Yeah? Let's go to my place.
Is it far? I don't think I could walk another step.
translation.zh: 你家远吗？我一步都走不动了

translation.en: Who said anything about walking?
BRITTANY: We're gonna die!
Oh, man! That was so cool!
I know, I know!
Come on. Come on in, guys! Bring it in.
Come on down!
Yeah! Wasn't that awesome?
No, it was not awesome. It's a miracle we got here safely.
translation.zh: 这不棒 我们能安全到这里是奇迹

translation.en: In fact, the odds of a chipmunk
translation.zh: 事实上 花栗鼠溜绳索

translation.en: getting hurt on a zip-line are one out of six.
translation.zh: 事实上 花栗鼠溜绳索 受伤的机率是六分之一

translation.en: (GROANS) Why do I always have to be right?
translation.zh: 事情为什么老是被我说中？

translation.en: Ellie, Ellie! Are you okay?
I think I sprained my ankle!
Ooh, you know what, you should put some ice on that.
translation.zh: 你知道吗 你应该冰敷

translation.en: Oh, no, guys, I don't have any ice. I live there in that tree.
translation.zh: 糟了 我没有冰块 我住在那棵树上

translation.en: I thought that maybe you did, though.
translation.zh: 但我以为你们有冰块呢

translation.en: No, we don't have any ice. Just like we don't have any shelter.
translation.zh: 我们没有冰块 也没有地方住

translation.en: Wow, that's a major bummer for you.
Do you guys like bungee jumping?
Yes!
No. We do not.
Listen, lady, maybe you should just leave us alone
translation.zh: 小姐 听着 你别管我们了

translation.en: so we can focus more on surviving and less on killing ourselves.
translation.zh: 让我们专心求生 而不是自杀

translation.en: Whoa, that is a lot of uptight in a very little package.
I'm not uptight. I just don't wanna see anyone else getting hurt. Ow!
translation.zh: 我没有多事 我只是不想再看到有人受伤了

translation.en: Criminy. What was that?
You know what, that was just a spider
and they live here because this is nature.
translation.zh: 它们住在这 因为这里是大自然

translation.en: It is not just a spider, it's a Phoneutria bahiensis.
translation.zh: 那不只是蜘蛛 那是毒蜘蛛

translation.en: Its bite contains a neurotoxin.
translation.zh: 它咬人会释放神经毒素

translation.en: Ooh! Mr. Fancy Words. So what?
translation.zh: 文言文先生 那又怎样？

translation.en: Alvin, toxin? Poison? Neuro? Brain?
translation.zh: 艾文 我说它有毒耶

translation.en: Oh. That's not good.
Side effects include changes in personality,
loss of inhibition, dry mouth.
Okay, calm down. I get bitten probably twice a day by these little fellows
translation.zh: 好 冷静点 我一天可能被它们咬两次

translation.en: and I am still completely normal.
translation.zh: 说真的 我还是很正常

translation.en: Yes, normal.
Oh, no.
DAVE: Alvin? Simon!
Chubby one!
Girl chubby one!
Brittany? Jeanette?
I hope they're okay.
Who cares if they're okay? I just need them to be here.
translation.zh: 谁在乎他们有没有事？ 我只需要他们出现

translation.en: And here I am thinking you've changed and don't only care about yourself.
translation.zh: 我还以为你改变了 不会只想到自己

translation.en: Nope. And it's a good thing, too.
Because right now the rage I'm feeling for you and those chipmunks
translation.zh: 因为现在 讨厌你和花栗鼠

translation.en: is the only thing keeping me going.
Shall we keep going?
Ian, just keep an eye out for something to eat or drink, all right?
translation.zh: 伊恩 留意一下吃的或喝的好吗？

translation.en: All right. Right there!
translation.zh: 好 噢 就在那里！

translation.en: Where?
That thing around your neck.
You're not gonna eat this. This was a gift from Theodore.
translation.zh: 你不能吃这个 这是喜多送的礼物

translation.en: That explains it. I was gonna say, it's really ugly.
translation.zh: 难怪 我正要说很丑

translation.en: Like, really... Wow. Ugly.
It's not ugly.
It goes with everything and it's soft enough to sleep in.
translation.zh: 这很百搭 戴着睡觉很软

translation.en: Yeah, and it's edible.
You will not eat my son's necklace.
translation.zh: 你不准吃我儿子送的项链

translation.en: He's not your son, Dave. He's just a chipmunk.
translation.zh: 大卫 他不是你儿子 他只是一只花栗鼠

translation.en: Oh, Dave. Where are you?
Where are you, Alvin?
IAN: All right.
I'm gonna crash.
Simon. Where are you going?
(WITH FRENCH ACCENT) Who is this Simon you speak of?
Um, you?
No, my name is not Simon. It is
Simone!
That's pretty close to Simon.
And yet completely different.
Would you care to join me on my adventure?
translation.zh: 你要跟我一起去探险吗？

translation.en: What adventure?
The adventure called life!
Okay.
But just until Dave shows up.
Alvin, Alvin!
Simon and Theodore are gone.
They probably just went to get stuff for the shelter.
translation.zh: 他们可能去找盖房子的材料

translation.en: It's all the guy can talk about.
Still, it's not like them to wander off like that.
translation.zh: 可他们不像是因为那个走的

translation.en: Could you please go look for them?
Why can't you?
I have a situation of my own to deal with, Alvin.
translation.zh: 艾文 我有自己的事情要处理

translation.en: Oh, right. How is Eleanor doing?
Huh? She's fine. I'm talking about me.
translation.zh: 她很好 我说的是我

translation.en: It's been two days since my last bath and I am a mess.
translation.zh: 我已经两天没洗澡了 我好惨

translation.en: I can't get rescued looking like this.
Oy.
Theo! Simon! Simon!
Theodore! Theo!
Si! Theo!
Bonjour, my friend.
Simon? Are you bungee jumping?
translation.zh: 赛门 你在玩蹦极吗？

translation.en: His name is not Simon.
It is Simone.
That's pretty close to Simon.
Yeah, I thought so, too. But he's acting totally different.
translation.zh: 对 我本来也这么想 但他的行为完全不一样

translation.en: The spider bite! That's it! Remember the side effects?
translation.zh: 被毒蜘蛛咬了就是这样 记得副作用吗？

translation.en: Personality changes, loss of inhibition?
translation.zh: 性情改变 抑制力丧失

translation.en: Lies! Who are you?
Wow! Simone is pretty cool.
It's Simon, Theodore. And, no, he's not.
translation.zh: 喜多 他是赛门 他不酷

translation.en: Au revoir, Alfred.
Alvin. It's Alvin!
Whoo! C'est magnifique, Simone!
Okay, Theo, it's all you.
translation.zh: 好 喜多 换你了

translation.en: Really? I've never done anything like this.
translation.zh: 真的吗？我没做过这种事

translation.en: And you never will.
How can you let him do this? What are you thinking?
translation.zh: 你怎么能让他做这种事？ 你在想什么？

translation.en: I'm thinking, "When did my dad wash up on this island?"
translation.zh: 我在想 我老爸什么时候被冲上岸了

translation.en: What? We were having the best time.
translation.zh: 什么？ 我们实在是太开心了

translation.en: Why do you have to show up and be so uptight?
Me? Uptight?
I'm not the uptight one, I'm the fun one!
translation.zh: 我才不是多事型的 我是风趣型的

translation.en: The cool one. Ask anybody.
translation.zh: 我很酷 你随便问一个就知道

translation.en: Who should I ask? (LAUGHING)
Come on. Theodore, you can't bungee jump.
translation.zh: 拜托 喜多 你不会高空弹跳

translation.en: You get scared just watching a movie.
Munk up, Alvin.
(MUFFLED) A little help?
Ah! Much better.
Jeanette, these dresses are, like, totally adorbs. I die.
translation.zh: 金妮 这些衣服 太美了 天啊

translation.en: Thank you. And I also made these for you, Eleanor.
translation.zh: 谢谢 伊妮 我还替你做了这个

translation.en: Oh, look how handy you are all of a sudden.
And in case you get tired, I made you a wheelchair.
translation.zh: 我还替你做了轮椅 以免你累了

translation.en: Oh, super.
A kiss. Enchante, mademoiselles.
translation.zh: 小姐 幸会 亲一下

translation.en: A kiss. And a...
(LAUGHS) A kiss.
Spider venom. What's gotten into him?
translation.zh: 他怎么了？ 蜘蛛的毒

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, he thinks he's some sort of fun-loving French dude.
translation.zh: 对 他以为他是风趣的法国佬

translation.en: Now he thinks he's... Really?
(MIMICKING SIMONE) The most interesting munk in the world.
translation.zh: 他是全世界最有趣的花栗鼠

translation.en: Simon? Simon.
Simone? Oui?
I think we should get to work on that shelter.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们得盖房子了

translation.en: Pourquoi? I cannot imagine a better roof over our heads
translation.zh: 为啥？我认为天上的星星

translation.en: than the stars in the sky.
What about the kind of roof over our head that's actually a roof?
translation.zh: 那来个真正的屋顶如何？

translation.en: It's going to rain!
What is a little rain? Hmm?
translation.zh: 下点小雨又怎样？ 我们珍惜水

translation.en: We cherish the water, for it is the water that nurtures the flower.
translation.zh: 我们珍惜水 因为水能滋养花朵

translation.en: (THUNDER CRASHES) Okay. This is crazy!
Building a shelter was your idea. Yours!
translation.zh: 盖房子原本是你的主意 你的！

translation.en: Oh, great. Great!
All right, guys, we're gonna build a shelter.
translation.zh: 各位 我们要盖房子

translation.en: I need everyone's help. Let's go.
translation.zh: 我需要所有人帮忙 走吧

translation.en: I'll try. But I feel so useless.
translation.zh: 我愿意试试 但我觉得自己很没用

translation.en: What are you doing?
What I've wanted to do
since the moment I laid my eyes all over on you.
translation.zh: 我一看到你以后就想这么做

translation.en: What? Huh?
Hey, you guys are going to catch pneumonia
dancing in the rain like that.
You ought to be careful kicking mud around like that.
translation.zh: 你在泥巴里乱踢要小心

translation.en: Hello?
Someone could lose an eye!
That looks like fun.
Eleanor? Would you care to dance?
I'd love to.
With me? (LAUGHS) Yes, Theodore!
BRITTANY: I can't believe Jeanette's getting all the attention.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信金妮这么红

translation.en: I'm the pretty one. Jeanette's the smart one.
translation.zh: 漂亮的人是我 金妮是聪明型的

translation.en: You don't see me running around trying to be all smart, do you?
translation.zh: 你没看到我到处耍聪明吧？

translation.en: I know! I'm the fun one,
translation.zh: 就是啊 我是风趣型的

translation.en: you're the pretty one. Yeah!
Do you know how slippery that dirt is? This is ridiculous.
translation.zh: 你知道泥巴有多滑吗？太扯了

translation.en: Are you even listening to me?
translation.zh: 你有认真听过我说话吗？

translation.en: Simon!
Alvin? You're starting to sound like Dave.
translation.zh: 艾文 你的口气越来越像大卫了

translation.en: (SCREAMING) No!
What are you doing?
Ugh. Building a shelter.
Since I'm not the fun one anymore
translation.zh: 由于我不是风趣型的了

translation.en: I figure I may as well be... (SHUDDERS)
The responsible one.
Ew. Really?
Well, since I'm not the pretty one anymore,
translation.zh: 由于我不是漂亮型的了

translation.en: maybe I should build a shelter, too.
translation.zh: 说不定我也该来盖房子

translation.en: Yeah, good luck with that.
What, you don't think I could do it?
translation.zh: 干嘛 你觉得我不行吗？

translation.en: Hey, I didn't say that, Brit.
translation.zh: 贝妮 我可没这么说

translation.en: I thought it, but I didn't say it.
translation.zh: 我有想 但我可没说

translation.en: So you wanna play it this way.
He's so French.
Oh! Be careful, Simone!
Let's do it.
Now, wasn't that a pleasant ride?
Good thing we don't wear pants.
Okay, you guys, come on, come over.
Are you sure it's safe?
Of course it's safe.
I do this thing every day.
Jeanette! THEODORE: Jeanette!
Hold on, Jeanette.
No, no. Look into my eyes.
You have nothing to fear.
Yes, yes. Very good.
Voila! You are safe. Bravo!
translation.zh: 好了 你安全了 太好了

translation.en: You're so brave. You made it!
Wow. Ooh la la!
ELEANOR: Pretty.
THEODORE: Whoa.
Double rainbow. What does it mean?
translation.zh: 双彩虹 这意味着什么呢？

translation.en: Alive they're superstars, sure. But dead? They're legends.
translation.zh: 他们活着是巨星没错 但死了以后 他们就是传奇了

translation.en: I'm talking about tribute albums, pay-per-view funerals.
translation.zh: 到时候可以出致敬专辑 观看丧礼按次收费

translation.en: Wait a second. You actually think I'm in this for the money?
translation.zh: 等一下 你真以为我做这行是为了钱？

translation.en: Well, if you're doing it to pick up chicks, you're doing a lousy job.
translation.zh: 如果你是为了把妹 那你做得也真够烂的

translation.en: I'm doing this because I love them, okay?
translation.zh: 我做这行是因为我爱他们 好吗？

translation.en: Look, if you wanna spend the rest of your life
running around after a bunch of spoiled brats, be my guest.
translation.zh: 追着那几个臭小子 那你就去吧

translation.en: They're not brats.
Really? Even Alvin?
You never even bothered to get to know them, Ian.
I mean, sure, Alvin can be kind of a handful,
translation.zh: 当然 艾文有点麻烦

translation.en: but he means well.
He's sometimes just a little irresponsible, that's all.
translation.zh: 他只是有时候不太负责任而已

translation.en: But, come on, Simon?
He's probably the most level-headed kid I know.
translation.zh: 他是我认识的最成熟的小孩了

translation.en: If anything, he's a little too uptight.
And then there's little Theodore.
Dave, I barely cared about what you had to say about the first two.
translation.zh: 大卫 我不在乎你对前两个的评语

translation.en: I can't imagine the big-boned one is gonna be any more interesting.
translation.zh: 但我没法想象小胖子能多有趣

translation.en: Forget it, let's just keep going.
translation.zh: 算了 我们继续走吧

translation.en: Oh, no. This is terrible.
Shouldn't he have come up by now?
Uh-oh. Simone! Where are you?
Zoe, you've gotta do something.
translation.zh: 佐伊 你得想想办法

translation.en: All right.
Callaway, I need you to go in there and find Simone.
translation.zh: 卡勒威 我要你下水找西门

translation.en: I know you can do it, little buddy.
translation.zh: 小兄弟 我知道你行的

translation.en: You're kidding, right?
If Callaway can't find him, nobody can. (EXCLAIMS IN PAIN)
translation.zh: 如果卡勒威找不到他 那谁都找不到

translation.en: (GASPS) Simone!
Told you.
I'm sorry if I caused you any worry, mademoiselle.
translation.zh: 小姐 抱歉让你担心了

translation.en: But I have something for you. Maybe this will be a way to make it up.
translation.zh: 但我有东西要给你 说不定这是补偿的办法

translation.en: Oh! It's beautiful!
Where did you find it?
Yeah, it is beautiful. Where did you find it?
translation.zh: 对啊 很美 你在哪里找到的？

translation.en: In a cave behind the waterfall.
I thought it would look nice on you.
translation.zh: 我觉得你戴了会很好看

translation.en: But now I realize even the most precious gem cannot compare to your beauty.
translation.zh: 但我现在发现 再美丽的宝石都没有你美

translation.en: Yeah. Were there any other jewels or gems or diamonds
translation.zh: 对 那里还有别的珠宝 宝石

translation.en: or anything else in there?
By the time I found the gold,
I had already been gone from my Jeanette far too long. Aw!
translation.zh: 我已经离开我的金妮太久了

translation.en: What?
You guys, they found it. They found it!
And the best part is, they don't even know what they found.
translation.zh: 最棒的是 他们根本不知道自己找到什么

translation.en: They think that it's just one bracelet.
translation.zh: 他们以为只有一个手镯

translation.en: Which means that the rest of the treasure is mine.
translation.zh: 这表示其余都是我的了

translation.en: All mine! (LAUGHING MANIACALLY)
(GRUNTING) What the...
Whoa! What are you?
Hey! Oh!
Yeah, you're one of those honey badgers.
translation.zh: 你就是传说中的蜜獾吧

translation.en: You just take what you want.
translation.zh: 随心所欲 想拿就拿

translation.en: Drop it. Drop it!
You mess with me, ese,
I'll go loco on you.
Whoa! Hey!
Give it back!
You can sting like a bee or strike like a cobra,
but this honey munk don't care!
translation.zh: 在我小蜜鼠跟前也得认栽

translation.en: Okay, Brit, I'm all done.
translation.zh: 好了 贝妮 我盖好了

translation.en: If you want, I can help you get started...
translation.zh: 你要的话 我可以帮你…

translation.en: Whoa!
This tree house is awesome.
Maybe you are kind of the smart one.
Thank you, Alvin. And yours is...
translation.zh: 艾文 谢谢 你的房子…

translation.en: you did your best.
Anyhoo, no reason we can't be comfortable and stylish
translation.zh: 总之 在我们等大卫来的时候

translation.en: while we wait for Dave to show up, right?
translation.zh: 舒适跟时髦可以兼备 对吗？

translation.en: Brit, I...
I think I know why Dave hasn't come.
translation.zh: 我想我知道大卫为什么没来了

translation.en: You do? Why?
'Cause he's not even looking.
translation.zh: 因为他根本没在找我们

translation.en: Alvin, why wouldn't he be looking for us?
translation.zh: 艾文 他为什么没在找我们？

translation.en: Because I drive him crazy.
You know, the way Simon's been driving me crazy?
translation.zh: 就像赛门惹我生气一样

translation.en: I mean, that's what I've been doing to Dave. For years.
translation.zh: 这些年来我都是这样对大卫

translation.en: No wonder he hates me.
Don't worry, Alvin.
I'm sure Dave will come.
I mean, he certainly loves Simon and Theodore.
translation.zh: 他绝对喜欢赛门跟喜多

translation.en: Simon? Is Dave ever gonna find us?
translation.zh: 赛门 大卫会找到我们吗？

translation.en: Simon? I mean, Simone?
I'm so sorry, were you speaking to moi?
translation.zh: 对不起 你在跟我说话吗？

translation.en: Yes! About Dave!
translation.zh: 对 我在说大卫的事

translation.en: Are we ever going to find him?
I see you are sad, mon ami.
translation.zh: 朋友 我觉得你很难过

translation.en: And I hate to see you sad.
I will help you find your friend Dave.
translation.zh: 我会帮你找到你的朋友大卫

translation.en: You really think you can find him?
translation.zh: 你真的觉得你能找到他？

translation.en: I know I can!
And then I will find this Simon you keep speaking of!
translation.zh: 然后我会去找那个 你一直挂在嘴边的赛门

translation.en: As Dave and I have never met, I will need you to describe him for me.
translation.zh: 由于我不认识大卫 我要你形容他的长相给我听

translation.en: Well, he's very kind and a good storyteller.
translation.zh: 他很善良 很会说故事

translation.en: Mmm-hmm. Very helpful.
Oh! And he's about this tall.
Is he by any chance a big, flightless bird?
I don't think so.
Then these footprints must not be his.
translation.zh: 那这些脚印一定不是他的

translation.en: (GASPS) Jungle Monster!
Do you hear that?
Yeah, it's my stomach grumbling.
No, no, maybe it's a helicopter! Listen!
translation.zh: 不 说不定是直升机 你听

translation.en: Face it, Dave, no one is coming to rescue us, okay?
translation.zh: 大卫 面对现实吧 没有人会来救我们的 好吗？

translation.en: And my stomach noises are gonna get louder and louder and louder
translation.zh: 我的肚子叫得越来越大声了

translation.en: until one day they just stop.
translation.zh: 直到有一天再也不叫了

translation.en: Because I will have eaten you.
translation.zh: 因为那时我已经把你给吃了

translation.en: Maybe you're right. Maybe no one's coming.
translation.zh: 或许你说的对 可能没有人会来

translation.en: Maybe the chipmunks aren't here at all. Maybe they're gone.
translation.zh: 或许花栗鼠根本不在这里 或许他们走了

translation.en: I really messed up.
Dave, it kills me to say this, kills me, but...
translation.zh: 大卫 我真的不想这么说 不过…

translation.en: Look, man,
you're really good with those kids, really good.
translation.zh: 你跟那些小孩相处得真的很好

translation.en: They love you.
And I should know because I was really
translation.zh: 但我应该知道 因为我跟他们关系不好

translation.en: bad with those kids and they hate me.
translation.zh: 但我应该知道 因为我跟他们关系不好 所以他们讨厌我

translation.en: But, look, you should know that whatever happens,
translation.zh: 不过你要知道不管发生什么事

translation.en: you did nothing wrong. Nothing.
translation.zh: 你一点错都没有 完全没有

translation.en: Thanks, Ian.
Come here.
Ian?
Ian? Ian!
The Jungle Monster's real! And it's angry!
translation.zh: 丛林怪物是真的 而且他火大了

translation.en: Or hungry. Allons-y!
That means let's go.
Oh.
Ow!
Great, a volcano.
Of course! That's why the water was so hot!
translation.zh: 对啊 所以水才会这么热

translation.en: It's being heated by the underground magma chamber!
translation.zh: 水被地底的岩浆加热了

translation.en: How do you know that?
I have no idea!
The place where I get my nails done always has the Science Channel on.
translation.zh: 我去做指甲的地方只放科学频道

translation.en: Maybe I accidentally paid attention.
translation.zh: 我可能不小心注意到了

translation.en: Hey, guys, anyone up for a quick hike?
Like, I don't know, maybe to the waterfall or whatever?
Not now, Zoe! The whole island is going to explode!
translation.zh: 佐伊 先不要闹 整座岛要爆炸了

translation.en: What?
Guys, we've got to get off this island. We have to build a raft, now.
translation.zh: 我们得离开这座岛 我们得马上打造木筏

translation.en: "Right now" like, right now?
Or "right now" like, after a hike to the waterfall now?
translation.zh: 还是去了瀑布之后的马上？

translation.en: (GRUNTS) I've been hit!
By Dave's necklace?
translation.zh: 你被大卫的项链打到了？

translation.en: Tell Jeanette I will watch over her with angel wings.
Dave?
Theodore!
SIMONE: Dave? Ha ha!
Told you we'd find him!
translation.zh: 就跟你说我们会找到他的

translation.en: Simon!
It is Simone, but I am often confused for this Simon fellow.
translation.zh: 我叫西门 但常常有人把我误认成赛门

translation.en: Perhaps we look alike?
Simone?
Ian!
Hey, you found the chubby one.
DAVE: Don't worry, Theodore.
Nothing's gonna happen to you. Is it?
translation.zh: 你不会有事的 对吗？

translation.en: (WHIMPERS) What was that?
That's an active volcano.
Okay, Brittany and I will build the deck.
translation.zh: 好 贝妮跟我做甲板

translation.en: Eleanor, you need to start braiding ropes.
Jeanette, find as many coconuts and mangoes as you can.
translation.zh: 金妮 去找椰子跟芒果 越多越好

translation.en: Who knows how long we'll be out there.
translation.zh: 谁知道我们要在这里待多久？

translation.en: What can I do to help?
Dave! Dave!
(GIGGLES EXCITEDLY) You found us! Hey.
We missed you so much.
I knew you would find us.
translation.zh: 我就知道你会找到我们的

translation.en: Eleanor! What happened?
translation.zh: 伊妮 发生什么事了？

translation.en: You know, just a zip-line accident.
A what? I'm fine.
translation.zh: 什么？ 我没事 我解释的时候才会痛

translation.en: It only hurts when I try to explain it.
translation.zh: 我没事 我解释的时候才会痛

translation.en: Okay, you know what, never mind.
The important thing is you guys are safe.
Alvin?
Everything's gonna be okay.
Hey, what is it?
I thought you'd never find us.
translation.zh: 我以为你永远不会找到我们

translation.en: That you weren't even looking.
Why wouldn't I look for you?
translation.zh: 我为什么不会来找你们？

translation.en: Because I'm such a pain in the...
Alvin.
I know, you don't think I'm a pain.
translation.zh: 我知道 你没觉得我是讨厌鬼

translation.en: No, you're a pain. But I'd come, no matter what.
translation.zh: 你是讨厌鬼 但我还是会来

translation.en: SIMONE: Arc de Triomphe, mayonnaise, Napoleon.
translation.zh: 凯旋门 美乃滋 拿破仑

translation.en: I get it, Frenchie, you come from a rich history.
translation.zh: 法国佬 我懂 你们有丰富的历史

translation.en: Well, guess what, we're all gonna be history if we don't get out of here.
translation.zh: 你知道吗 再不离开这里 我们就要变成历史了

translation.en: CHIPETTES: (GASPING) Uncle Ian!
What's he doing here?
It's kind of a long story.
Don't worry, he's cool.
Yes, for a pelican man.
Oh, yeah, nothing cooler than a grown man in a pelican suit.
translation.zh: 是啊 扮成鹈鹕的大人最酷了

translation.en: So, Dave, how are we gonna get out of here?
translation.zh: 大卫 我们要怎么离开这里？

translation.en: I don't know, Alvin, I think you've got this under control.
translation.zh: 我不知道 艾文 我想你可以搞定

translation.en: Theodore, you and Eleanor are on rope duty.
translation.zh: 喜多 你跟伊妮负责绳索

translation.en: Dave and Ian, we need oars.
translation.zh: 大卫跟伊恩 我们需要桨

translation.en: Simone, you and Jeanette are in charge of food.
translation.zh: 西门 你跟金妮负责食物

translation.en: And, Zoe...
No, I know, I know. I'm gonna go and I'm gonna pack up my balls!
translation.zh: 我知道 我要去把我的球收一收

translation.en: Who's that?
Another long story.
Yeah! Good work, guys! Let's get off this island.
translation.zh: 干得好 伙伴们！ 让我们离开这个岛吧

translation.en: This raft won't build itself.
Go! Go! Go!
Heave! ALVIN: Ho!
BRITTANY: Heave! ALVIN: Ho!
It's incredible, you guys.
Very impressive.
Just seeing everyone come together to build it...
(VOLCANO RUMBLING) I just want to say...
It can wait.
Wait, where are Jeanette and Simone?
translation.zh: 等等 金妮跟西门呢？

translation.en: (EXHALING) I hope this is going to be enough.
(GASPS) Did you hear something?
Who can say?
When I am with you, all I can hear
translation.zh: 跟你在一起时 我只听得到我的心跳声

translation.en: is the beating of my own heart.
translation.zh: 我只听得到我的心跳声

translation.en: Oh, Simone!
(PANTING) Oh, no!
Oh, no!
Somebody! Help!
Jeanette?
ALVIN: Guys! Guys! Over here! Come quick, hurry!
translation.zh: 各位 这里 快点过来！

translation.en: Simone, are you okay?
Simone!
translation.zh: 西门 你没事吧？ 西门

translation.en: Why are you calling me Simone?
Simon?
translation.zh: 你为什么叫我西门？ 赛门？

translation.en: Yeah.
(LAUGHS) You're back! It finally wore off!
What wore off?
translation.zh: 什么东西退了？ 你被毒蜘蛛咬了 你秀逗了

translation.en: You were bitten by a spider. It, like, messed up your brain.
translation.zh: 你被毒蜘蛛咬了 你秀逗了

translation.en: Ah. Is that why I think I see Dave
translation.zh: 所以我才以为我看到大卫

translation.en: and a half-Ian, half-bird?
translation.zh: 还有半个伊恩半个鸟吗？

translation.en: No, it's really me. And really Ian.
translation.zh: 没有 那真的是我跟伊恩

translation.en: 'Sup?
Simon, where's Jeanette? She was out here with you.
translation.zh: 赛门 金妮呢？ 她刚刚跟你在这里

translation.en: Jeanette? I don't know...
I do.
It's Zoe. She took her.
translation.zh: 是佐伊 她把金妮带走了

translation.en: Simon, I need to know where you found that gold bracelet.
translation.zh: 赛门 我得知道 你是在哪里找到的金手镯

translation.en: What gold bracelet?
The one you gave to Jeanette.
What? When did I give Jeanette a bracelet?
translation.zh: 什么？我什么时候给过金妮东西？

translation.en: On your date.
(GASPS) Jeanette and I are dating?
Okay, he's useless.
Theodore, Eleanor, you're gonna have to lead the way.
translation.zh: 喜多 伊妮 你们带路

translation.en: I don't remember exactly how to get there.
translation.zh: 我不太记得去那儿的路

translation.en: I do!
Which way, Eleanor?
Make a left. No, right. No, left!
translation.zh: 往左 不对 往右 不对 往左

translation.en: I thought you said you knew where you were going.
I do! Sometimes I just forget my left from my right.
translation.zh: 我知道啊 有时候我会忘了左右

translation.en: That way!
Okay, we just have to cross here.
translation.zh: 好 我们得通过这里

translation.en: (GASPS) Are you kidding me?
Guys, I can't do that.
But, Simon, you already did.
translation.zh: 可是赛门 你已经走过了

translation.en: No, I didn't. That was Simone, that was not me.
translation.zh: 我才没有 那是西门 不是我

translation.en: But Simone is you. He's in there somewhere.
translation.zh: 可是西门就是你 他是你的一部分

translation.en: You just have to find him, tout de suite.
Because Jeanette needs you, Simon.
translation.zh: 因为金妮需要你 赛门

translation.en: No, I'm sorry, I just can't do it.
translation.zh: 对不起 我就是办不到

translation.en: All right, Ian, get everyone to the raft.
translation.zh: 伊恩 把大家带去木筏那里

translation.en: If the volcano blows before I make it out of here,
translation.zh: 万一火山在我离开前爆发

translation.en: you have to promise me you'll...
Leave without you. Got it.
translation.zh: 抛下你就走 没问题

translation.en: (SIGHS) Okay.
Dave.
I'm coming with you.
Absolutely not, it's too dangerous.
translation.zh: 绝对不行 太危险了

translation.en: Remember I said someday I may need to disobey you?
translation.zh: 记得我说过 有一天我可能会不听你的话吗？

translation.en: Sorry, Dave, but I gotta disobey you.
translation.zh: 抱歉 大卫 我得违背你

translation.en: Let's go.
You're not coming up until you have every last bit of that treasure.
translation.zh: 把宝藏全部找出来才准你上来

translation.en: But the volcano is about to explode!
Well, then I guess you better hurry, huh?
Run, go, go. In you go.
Get down there. That's right.
Keep going!
Keep moving!
Okay! Pull me up. I can't hold any more.
translation.zh: 好 拉我上去 我撑不住了

translation.en: If you can still talk, it means you haven't stuffed your cheeks yet!
translation.zh: 如果你还能说话 表示你的嘴还塞得不够满

translation.en: Yes! That sounds very good.
Jeanette!
ALVIN: Dave!
They're supposed to be behind that waterfall!
That's right. That's what I'm talking about. (MUFFLED SPEECH)
ALVIN: Zoe!
No, no. Not another step.
Don't come any closer.
Are you all right, Jeanette?
I'm pretty freaked out,
and those earrings tasted awful.
Zoe, you don't have to do this.
translation.zh: 佐伊 你不必这么做的

translation.en: Oh, I don't? I spent 10 years looking for this treasure.
translation.zh: 我不必吗？ 我在这里找了十年宝藏

translation.en: It's the whole reason why I came to this stinking island!
translation.zh: 这就是我来这座烂岛的原因

translation.en: You mean you didn't crash-land?
They said that I was crazy and they said that this map was a fake.
translation.zh: 大家说我疯了 大家说这张图是假的

translation.en: And now the treasure is mine!
Run!
Jeanette, come on, come on.
Run!
(SQUEALS) ZOE: No, you don't!
Jeanette!
Oh, no!
JEANETTE: Help, help!
Oh, no, help!
You're going back in that cave, and you are going to get me more treasure.
translation.zh: 你再给我回洞穴拿更多宝藏来

translation.en: Jeanette!
Simone!
It's Simon!
(DISTORTED) Alvin!
(DISTORTED) No!
DAVE: Come on, guys, go! Hurry!
Go, go!
Come on, come on.
Look!
Come on!
Run!
But where's Dave?
Help me up! Oh, help you up?
Is that what I'm supposed to do now, Dave?
translation.zh: 大卫 那是我现在该做的事吗？

translation.en: All I had was my treasure, and now it's gone.
translation.zh: 我只有宝藏 现在宝藏没了

translation.en: Do you get that? My life is ruined.
And now you're gonna know how that feels.
translation.zh: 现在我也要让你尝尝这种滋味

translation.en: No, no!
IAN: It's tempting to blame Dave.
translation.zh: 我也曾认为 都是大卫害的

translation.en: I know. I've been there.
translation.zh: 我知道 我也有过这样的想法

translation.en: I wish I could get back all those years I spent plotting my revenge.
translation.zh: 我真希望能回到想报仇的日子

translation.en: All that time and energy, wasted.
translation.zh: 那段光阴跟精力都浪费掉了

translation.en: All those pizzas I had delivered to his house, wasted.
translation.zh: 我送到他家的比萨都浪费掉了

translation.en: That was you? Not now, Dave! All right?
translation.zh: -那是你叫的？ -大卫 现在先别说话 好吗？

translation.en: You could let Dave fall to his death
and I could go back to the raft with the chipmunks,
translation.zh: 我可以回木筏那里找花栗鼠

translation.en: become their manager again and make tons of money.
translation.zh: 再当他们的经纪人 赚一大堆钱

translation.en: So, really, I'm good either way.
translation.zh: 所以说真的 他摔不摔死都可以

translation.en: But let me tell you something. (VOLCANO RUMBLING)
Hate, anger, regret,
translation.zh: 仇恨 愤怒 后悔

translation.en: those aren't just members of a girl group I once signed.
translation.zh: 不只是我签过的女生团的名字

translation.en: They're what consumed me. And they're consuming you.
translation.zh: 它们曾经吞噬了我 而此刻也正在吞噬你

translation.en: It's not too late to do the right thing.
translation.zh: 做出正确的事还不会太迟

translation.en: Or not. Again,
translation.zh: 你也可以不做 再说一次

translation.en: I'm good either way, so...
I don't want to sway you.
translation.zh: 所以我不是要动摇你的决定

translation.en: What are you guys doing? Help me.
translation.zh: 你们在干嘛 帮帮我

translation.en: Please. Help me save my dad!
translation.zh: 拜托 帮我救我的爸爸

translation.en: Hurry!
I got you, Dave.
Come on! Help me, guys.
(BOTH GASP) Wow!
There they are!
Hurry!
DAVE: Come on! Come on!
ZOE: Come on!
Grab the oar!
Come on! Come on, guys!
Paddle!
Come on! Paddle!
Faster! Come on, hurry!
Now we'll never get to perform at the International Music Awards.
translation.zh: 我们不能去国际音乐奖表演了

translation.en: I guess now we're the losers.
translation.zh: 我想我们现在是不红了

translation.en: Jeanette, I don't know what to say.
translation.zh: 金妮 我不知道该说什么

translation.en: I guess I was just so obsessed with finding that treasure
translation.zh: 我想我鬼迷心窍想找宝藏

translation.en: that I kind of... I lost it.
And I'm... I'm really sorry.
We both are.
Well, apology accepted.
Here, I want you to have this.
translation.zh: 来 我希望你收下这个

translation.en: Really?
Look, Dunlop, this is a new beginning
translation.zh: 登洛普 这是全新的开始

translation.en: for both of us.
I hope you don't mind.
Simone gave it to me.
Oh, I don't mind.
You know, Jeanette, even the most perfect gem
translation.zh: 金妮 再完美的宝石

translation.en: cannot compare to your beauty.
Dave?
Yes, Alvin?
I just wanted to say
now that we're not all, you know, dead,
sorry. Sorry.
Sorry I was acting like a child on the ship.
translation.zh: 我在船上的行为很幼稚

translation.en: And kind of maybe ruined our family vacation.
translation.zh: 而且毁了我们一家的出游

translation.en: Sometimes a racehorse needs a little room to run.
translation.zh: 有时候 赛马需要一点跑步的空间

translation.en: Yes. Yeah. I like where your head's at.
translation.zh: 对 我欣赏你的观点

translation.en: That is very wise, David.
IAN: 'Sup?
What, no love for Uncle Ian?
translation.zh: 干嘛 你们不爱伊恩叔叔？

translation.en: You put us in cages! You put us in cages!
translation.zh: 你把我们关进笼子里耶

translation.en: Seriously? Are we still talking about that?
translation.zh: 真的假的？这件事还没过去？

translation.en: New subject, I saved Dave's life.
translation.zh: 换个话题吧 我救了大卫的命

translation.en: Okay, but I'll be watching you, mister.
translation.zh: 好 但我会注意你的 先生

translation.en: Alvin, you still have that pocket knife I gave you?
translation.zh: 艾文 我给你的瑞士刀还在吗？

translation.en: Knife? Oh, right, sorry, I meant to give it back.
translation.zh: 刀？对喔 抱歉 我原本就想还给你

translation.en: I want you to keep it.
Really?
Maybe you can use it to signal that helicopter. (WHIRRING)
translation.zh: 你可以用它来跟直升机打讯号

translation.en: What?
Hey! Down here!
Hello!
It's me, Ian Hawke! Jet Records!
translation.zh: 我是伊恩浩克！喷气机唱片那个！

translation.en: MAN ON MEGAPHONE: Everything's okay. We got you, guys!
It's good to be back, huh?
Sure is.
Sold Zoe's story to Hollywood. Huge bidding war.
translation.zh: 我把佐伊的故事卖给好莱坞了 被疯抢

translation.en: Keira Knightley is interested.
I'm thinking Fiddy Cent for me.
Thank you!
Thank you! Thank you.
You're a great audience. We love you!
translation.zh: -你们很棒 -我们爱你 谢谢

translation.en: I'm sorry, sir, that's full.
We're gonna have to gate-check those.
(SIGHS) Are you gonna charge me 25 bucks a bag?
translation.zh: 托运一个袋子你要收我二十五块？

translation.en: Of course not, sir.
It's $25 for the first bag
translation.zh: 第一个袋子收二十五块

translation.en: and $40 for each additional bag.
I'm a little chilly. Would you mind adjusting the vent?
translation.zh: 我有点冷 麻烦你调一下我的风口好吗？

translation.en: But of course.
Oh! You wrinkled my business magazine.
translation.zh: 你把我的商业杂志弄皱了

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 你把我的商业杂志弄皱了 对不起

translation.en: Guess I'll have to read this. Ooh, she's pretty.
translation.zh: 我只好读这个了 噢 她好美

translation.en: Oh, wait, that's me.
All right, head count.
Boo! (GROWLING)
You like my Jungle Monster costume? Eleanor made it for me.
translation.zh: 你喜欢我的丛林怪物装吗？ 伊妮替我做的

translation.en: Yeah! Out of a barf bag!
Nice.
translation.zh: 我用呕吐袋做的 赞

translation.en: Where's Alvin?
ALVIN: Ladies and gentlemen, this is your captain speaking.
translation.zh: 各位先生女士 我是机长

translation.en: We're cleared for an on-time departure for Timbuktu.
translation.zh: 本班机将准时飞往廷巴克图

translation.en: If Timbuktu is not for you,
translation.zh: 如果乘客不是要去廷巴克图

translation.en: please alert the flight attendant by pressing your call button.
Alvin!
Thank you for choosing Air Alvin. Enjoy your flight!
translation.zh: 感谢您搭乘艾文航空 祝您飞行愉快

translation.en: (CALL BUTTONS DINGING)
translation.zh: 祝您飞行愉快 先生 请您回座 我们要起飞了

translation.en: Sir, please return to your seat, we're about to take off.
translation.zh: 先生 请您回座 我们要起飞了

translation.en: Uh-oh. Sit. Now.
But he... Sit!
No, no, no!
(SCREAMING) Alvin!
